name: The Adventures of Sam Carlisle: The Hunt for the Lost Treasure
description: My name is Sam. Sam Carlisle. I have a normal life. A life that I really enjoy. It is simple really. I go to work, come home and work on a secret project. A project that will make me millions. A lost treasure. A treasure too big for one man, one man alone.
minimum_requirements: OS: 7,8,10 Processor: 1.66 GHz Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: 512MB VRAM Storage: 500 MB available space Sound Card: Required DirectX 9 Additional Notes: XBox Controller with Vibration
